channel.title: Game on Dev.Poga
channel.description: Recent content in Game on Dev.Poga

item.title: I developed a game to fix my burnout. It sucks.
item.description: I’m a burnt-out programmer, never an artist. Okay? I’m a typical burnt-out programmer due to typical reasons. And this time, it’s particularly bad. I literally want to throw up multiple times when I’m coding this damn game and also struggling to finish the game. But I still made it across the finish line. The game sucks so much that I don’t know if it can be called a game. But I made it.
